lead_paragraph: President Vladimir Putin said a shadowy political plot had succeeded in unfairly stripping some Russian sportspeople of the right to compete at the Rio Olympics over doping allegations and promised to defend Russia's tarnished sporting reputation.

headline.print_headline: Putin: Olympic Ban on Russian Athletes Is Result of Political Plot
headline.main: Putin: Olympic Ban on Russian Athletes Is Result of Political Plot

snippet: President Vladimir Putin said a shadowy political plot had succeeded in unfairly stripping some Russian sportspeople of the right to compete at the Rio Olympics over doping allegations and promised to defend Russia's tarnished sporting reputation....
